    Rules:

      Rules:

    • Click on one of the squares on the right (or bottom) grid to try and hit an enemy vessel!
    • Once a ship has taken enough hits, it will be counted as sunk!
    • Each player has 10 ships, 1 Carrier, 2 Battleships, 3 Cruisers, and 4 Scouts
